text: The Science of Sleep (French: La Science des rêves, literally The Science of Dreams) is a 2006 French Italian American fantasy comedy movie directed by Michel Gondry and starring Gael García Bernal, Charlotte Gainsbourg, Miou- Miou, Alain Chabat, Emma de Caunes, Pierre Vaneck. ==Other websites== * * * Category:2006 comedy movies Category:2006 fantasy movies Category:French fantasy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Italian fantasy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:2000s American fantasy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Michel Gondry
title: The Science of Sleep
